file_content.text: IDENTIFICATION: Encrypted Multiphasic Data Relay
IDENTIFICATION: MCR-99 Espionage Droid
Evie Bo: Hey--that's one of the Shroud's spy droids. Won't help us triangulate anything, but keep an eye out for more of them suckers.
Deena Riss: That won't help us triangulate anything--but, you know, that is one of the Shroud's spy droids. Keep an eye out for more of those--they'll be worth tracking.
OBJECTIVE CONFIRMATION: Target identified as Shroud espionage droid and flagged for further observation.

::Shroud Transmitter Identified::
Partial Transmission Decoded: -- wavelength patterns suggest shielding deficiencies --

::Shroud Transmitter Identified::
Partial Transmission Decoded: -- checking all political chatter against known code words --

::Shroud Transmitter Identified::
Partial Transmission Decoded: -- sleeper agents scheduled for reawakening --
Deena Riss: There you go. That's just what we're looking for. Good work.
Evie Bo: Yep, that's it--that's exactly what you're looking for. Keep at it.

IDENTIFICATION: Artillery Storage Bunker
INTERNAL SCAN: Heavy weapon signatures detected, all matching Regulator equipment profiles.
IDENTIFICATION: Ray Shield Generator
SENSOR ANALYSIS: Energy flow pattern traced to nearby security door ray shields.
IDENTIFICATION: Ray-Shielded Security Door Controls

INTERNAL SCAN: Panel circuitry consistent with security locking systems.
WARNING: Ray shielding protects the entire mechanism.
IDENTIFICATION: Security Console
INTERNAL SCAN: Circuitry consistent with door control mechanisms.
IDENTIFICATION: Staged Generator Controls

FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Console controls incrementally adjust output of the surrounding Rakatan Generator.
SENSOR ANALYSIS: Power flow traced to nearby laser defense grid.
IDENTIFICATION: Overload Inhibitor Panel
FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Safeguard mechanism preventing generator output levels from increasing above material tolerances.
IDENTIFICATION: Emergency Heat Sink
FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Failsafe device that vents excess thermal energy from the generator, preventing its output from overloading the system.
IDENTIFICATION: Red-Coded Security Sequencer

FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Input device for a color-coded security sequence.
INFRARED ANALYSIS: Surface handprint consistent with Ortolan species.
THERMAL SCAN--HANDPRINT: 20 degrees standard.

FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Input device for a color-coded security sequence.
INFRARED ANALYSIS: Surface handprint consistent with Ortolan species.
THERMAL SCAN--HANDPRINT: 31 degrees standard.
IDENTIFICATION: Green-Coded Security Sequencer

FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Input device for a color-coded security sequence.
INFRARED ANALYSIS: Surface handprints consistent with Ortolan species. Two handprints identified.
THERMAL SCAN--HANDPRINT 1: 27 degrees standard.
THERMAL SCAN--HANDPRINT 2: 38 degrees standard.
IDENTIFICATION: Manual Security Override Panel

FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Console enabling direct manual override of the security lockdown.
WARNING: Input of correct code sequence is required for operation.
IDENTIFICATION: Empty Cryoban Barrel

FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Industrial-grade chemical containment barrel.
INTERNAL SCAN: Empty. Interior surface coated with cold-resistant materials.
IDENTIFICATION: Cryoban Storage Tank Controls

INTERNAL SCAN: Tank contains supercooled cryoban chemical solution.
STRUCTURAL ANALYSIS: Tank connects to a series of pipes designed to carry cryoban liquid throughout the facility.
IDENTIFICATION: Reinforced Door
STRUCTURAL SCAN: Composed of a durasteel/cortosis alloy. Impervious to all known small arms.
IDENTIFICATION: Cryoban Barrel

FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Industrial-grade chemical containment barrel.
INTERNAL SCAN: Contains cryoban chemical solution.
REFERENCE--"CRYOBAN": A supercooled liquid used for industrial and combat purposes. Capable of flash-freezing most materials instantly.
IDENTIFICATION: Transport Antenna
STRUCTURAL SCAN: Reinforced durasteel construction. Capable of serving as an anchor point for grapple guns, jetpack targeting relays, and Force-sensitive individuals.
IDENTIFICATION: Ray-Shielded Electrostatic Generator

FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Powers the ceiling-mounted electrostatic discharge array nearby.
WARNING: Ray shielding protects the entire device.
IDENTIFICATION: Laser Grid Kinetic Override Switch

FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Manually deactivates one of the laser grids protecting the nearby elevator.
WARNING: Deactivation is temporary!
IDENTIFICATION: Kinetic Override Switch
INTERNAL SCAN: Circuitry consistent with door locking systems.
IDENTIFICATION: Detached Lever

FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Manual pull-lever used to operate a mechanical switch.
STRUCTURAL SCAN: Microfractures and material stresses indicate that this lever was forcibly removed from its intended mechanism.
IDENTIFICATION: Security Management Station
FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Operates most of the factory level security systems, doors, and defenses.
IDENTIFICATION: Loose Boulder

PETROLOGICAL ANALYSIS: 82% regotite, 18% chalcopyrite
WARNING: Object is precariously balanced, and could fall if disturbed.
IDENTIFICATION: Ray-Shielded Defense Grid Generator

SENSOR ANALYSIS: Energy flow pattern traced to nearby laser defense grid.
WARNING: Ray shielding protects the entire device.
IDENTIFICATION: Defense Grid Generator
SENSOR ANALYSIS: Energy flow pattern traced to nearby laser defense grid.
IDENTIFICATION: Ray-Shielded Security Holocamera

FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Security surveillance device.
SIGNAL INTERCEPT: This holocamera is tracking your movements.
WARNING: Ray shielding protects the entire device.
IDENTIFICATION: Pressure Valve Cap
FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Controls release of superheated steam through area pipe system.
IDENTIFICATION: Fragrant Sewer Fruit

BIOANALYSIS: Fruit growth. Toxic when consumed by most human and near-human species. Steadily releases non-toxic spores which carry a noticeable odor.
REFERENCE--"FRAGRANT SEWER FRUIT": Found only in the sewer ecosystems of the planet Quesh. Considered a delicacy by many Hutts.
IDENTIFICATION: Electrostatic Capacitor
FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Controls the storage and release of electricity into nearby control station's defenses.
IDENTIFICATION: Ray-Shielded Master Laser Grid Controls

FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Controls the large laser defense grid nearby.
WARNING: Ray shielding protects the entire device.
IDENTIFICATION: Crushed Corpse

BIOANALYSIS: Human (Deceased)
MORTALITY ASSESSMENT: Crushed to death by falling debris due to partial ceiling collapse.
POSITIONAL SUPPOSITION: Subject may have been attempting to bypass the nearby laser defense grid at the time of death.
IDENTIFICATION: Alderaanian Weather Tower
SIGNAL INTERCEPT: Device is constantly collecting and relaying data on regional atmospheric conditions, including air chemical composition and ambient ionization.
IDENTIFICATION: House Thul Transmitter
IDENTIFICATION: House Alde Transmitter
IDENTIFICATION: House Organa Transmitter
IDENTIFICATION: House Rist Transmitter
SIGNAL INTERCEPT: Device is relaying holosignal traffic to and from the Great House.
IDENTIFICATION: Giant Red Thranta
SIGNAL DETECTION: This creature is carrying GSI surveillance equipment.
Click To Return
Click To Zoom
IDENTIFICATION: Crashed Ship
DAMAGE EXTRAPOLATION: This starship crashed at least in part due to unusual planetary factors.
IDENTIFICATION: Crashed Escape Pod
DATA ANALYSIS: This escape pod's logs contain detailed crash data.
IDENTIFICATION: Crashed Ship Debris
SENSOR ANALYSIS: Equipment scattered through this debris contains stolen GSI data.
INTERNAL SCAN: Panel circuitry consistent with security door locking systems.
IDENTIFICATION: Security Door Controls

FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Security surveillance device.
SIGNAL INTERCEPT: This holocamera is tracking your movements.
WARNING: Ray shielding protects the entire device.
SENSOR ANALYSIS: Energy flow pattern traced to nearby room.

FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Controls nearby sewer gate.
WARNING: Ray shielding protects the entire device.
IDENTIFICATION: Ray-Shielded Gate Controls
IDENTIFICATION: Power Conduit Access Panel

INTERNAL SCAN: Cables and circuitry for the facility's non-critical subsystems.
ELECTROMAGNETIC ANALYSIS: Electrically active, but unconnected to nearby electrostatic defense array.
IDENTIFICATION: Electrostatic Generator
SENSOR ANALYSIS: Energy flow pattern traced to nearby electrostatic defense array.
IDENTIFICATION: Electrostatic Defense Array
FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Emits timed bursts of lethal electricity to deter potential intruders.
IDENTIFICATION: Yellow-Coded Security Sequencer
IDENTIFICATION: Electrical Junction Box
INTERNAL SCAN: Circuitry consistent with laser defense grid security systems.
IDENTIFICATION: Cryoban Flow Control Junction

FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Valve directing the flow of supercooled cryoban liquid through area storage system.
INTERNAL SCAN: A light impact could toggle the internal flow control valve.
IDENTIFICATION: Weakened Cryoban Pipe

STRUCTURAL ANALYSIS: High internal pressure has placed significant material strain on this pipe.
WARNING: Considerable risk of structural failure.
IDENTIFICATION: Reinforced Security Bulkhead
STRUCTURAL SCAN: Composed of a durasteel/cortosis alloy. Impervious to all known small arms.
IDENTIFICATION: Meteorite Fragment
SENSOR ANALYSIS: This meteorite contains a rare, extremely dense phobium variant.
IDENTIFICATION: Sandcrawler
VEHICULAR CROSS-REFERENCE: This sandcrawler matches the description of the one containing GSI's lost droids.
IDENTIFICATION: Light Bridge Control Console
FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Activates and deactivates nearby light bridge.
IDENTIFICATION: Maintenance Access Gate

FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Provides access to a maintenance corridor.
SECURITY ANALYSIS: This gate is locked.
IDENTIFICATION: Light Bridge Energy Generator
FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Generator capable of providing half of the energy necessary to sustain nearby light bridge.
IDENTIFICATION: Light Bridge Security Lockout Station
FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: While active, console prevents access to any light bridge systems.
IDENTIFICATION: Lockout Station Maintenance Panel
FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Provides remote access to nearby security lockout station.
IDENTIFICATION: Open Pressure Release Valve

FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Vents excess system pressure.
WARNING: This valve is generating a tremendous amount of upward force.
IDENTIFICATION: Ray Shield Control Console
FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Regulates power input to the Shroud's ray shield system.
IDENTIFICATION: Moisture Vaporator
SENSOR ANALYSIS: This moisture vaporator is significantly smaller than standard models.
SIGNAL INTERCEPT--FAILED: The encryption used for this tower's transmissions is highly sophisticated.
IDENTIFICATION: Sanctuary Transmission Tower
IDENTIFICATION: Seed of Rage Corruption Site
SENSOR ANALYSIS: Unidentified energy field detected. Exposure effects unknown--caution is advised.
IDENTIFICATION: GSI Dig Site
OBJECTIVE CONFIRMATION: This area matches objective data provided by GSI.
IDENTIFICATION: Potentially Valuable Excavation Zone

PROFIT ANALYSIS: GSI survey probe data indicates that something of value may be buried in this area.
RECOMMENDATION: GSI Seeker Droids are an excellent choice for even the toughest excavations!
IDENTIFICATION: Regulator Anti-Aircraft Gun

TARGET ACQUISITION: Objective coordinates confirmed.
WARNING: Incoming missile attack!
IDENTIFICATION: Communications Satellite Dish

SENSOR SCAN: Design profile matches known mercenary configuration.
DATAFLOW EXTRAPOLATION: This device could facilitate triangulation of droid schematics requested by GSI.

FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Ancient technology capable of increasing natural attributes.
INTERNAL SCAN: This datacron contains a colored Matrix Shard.
REFERENCE--"MATRIX SHARD": Colored crystalline shards which can be combined to produce beneficial effects to the user.

IDENTIFICATION: Bio-Containment Canister

CONTENTS ASSESSMENT: Contains a potent bio-electrical gel effective known to temporarily stun biological beings on contact.
MARKING ANALYSIS: Consistent with containers seen suppressing prisoners inside of the Arcanum.
IDENTIFICATION: Field Turret Power Generator

FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Capable of sustaining numerous sentry turrets once fully charged.
ENERGY LEVEL ANALYSIS: Currently under-powered. Requires 8 fully-charged Universal Power Cells to operate.
IDENTIFICATION: Power Cell Charging Station
FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Recharges and dispenses Universal Power Cells that can be used to power many types of devices.
IDENTIFICATION: Portable Force Field Generator

FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Capable of producing a defensive force field. Requires Universal Power Cells to function.
DEFENSIVE ANALYSIS: Damage taken by the forcefield will drain the generator's power cells. Power cells will need to be replaced if damage is critical.
IDENTIFICATION: Kathracite Force Crystal
IDENTIFICATION: Mephite Force Crystal
IDENTIFICATION: Pontite Force Crystal

DATALOG ANALYSIS: These crystals are documented as possessing an unusually high attunement to the Force.
WARNING: Crystals of the same color and wavelength can be used to cancel one another's energy.
IDENTIFICATION: Regulator Signal Jammer

TARGET ACQUISITION: Objective coordinates confirmed.
WARNING: Incoming orbital strike!
IDENTIFICATION: Tangled Grove - Corrupted Tentacle Root Detected
DATA ANALYSIS: Seed-root responsible for corrupted tentacle growth detected within subsurface soil.
IDENTIFICATION: Corrupted Obelisk

ANALYSIS: Unnatural skyward outgrowth of crustal rock and hardwood roots. Phenomenon likely due to prolonged exposure to dark bioenergies.
ASSESSMENT: Soil likely contains corrupted tentacle seed-root samples suitable for scientific analysis. Excavation highly recommended.
Bounty Seeker Probe

==SCAN REPORT==
RESULT: POSITIVE
-Probe data matching target parameters isolated. -Data insufficient to confirm target location. -Additional probe scans required to triangulate target location. -Data downloaded to tracking scanner. -Probe returning to base....

==SCAN REPORT==
RESULT: POSITIVE
-Probe data matching target parameters isolated. -Data confirms target location. -Coordinates downloaded to tracking scanner. -Probe returning to base....

==SCAN REPORT==
RESULT: NEGATIVE
-No target match found. -Scanning additional probes may yield better results. -Probe returning to base....
Czerka Email Datareader

TO: Czerka Sentient Resources FROM: Brendan Hillin SUBJECT: Formal Complaint FC-2A-8775
I stored a tin of freshly baked warra nut cookies in the EMPLOYEE-ONLY refrigeration unit today. When I opened the tin this afternoon it was empty save for a holo of Doctor Faye, mouth full of my cookies. THIS IS THEFT. We cannot entrust vital biological research to a THIEF. FIRE HIM IMMEDIATELY.

TO: Czerka Sentient Resources FROM: Coro Lanra SUBJECT: Formal Complaint FC-2A-8798
I left my security badge at my desk last week and got locked out of the lab. Fifteen years I've been working for Czerka, and the security guard acted like he didn't even know me. They had to call the director to verify my security clearance ON THE INTERCOM. I used to get adoring interns asking about my CZ-X32 Sublimation Matrix, but now they think it's funny to ask for my security badge when they see me getting a cup of caf.

TO: Czerka Staff - CZ-198 FROM: Sentient Resources Department SUBJECT: Company Etiquette
As Czerka is a professional company, I would not have expected this to be an issue, but apparently it needs to be stated. Please do not enter and use the refresher in front of our cleaning staff. If you see the cleaning sign, then please either locate another facility or just wait.
Thanks, Hawek Yellip

TO: Hawek Yellip FROM: Chief Zokar SUBJECT: Request for transfer
Consider this my formal request for transfer back to a security operations position. After that thing with Tatooine, I accepted that I'd have to take my licks. I think I've proven with this assignment that I am a team player and I want back into the show. With my training and experience, I should be back out there in the field where I can be most valuable for Czerka.

TO: Czerka Sentient Resources FROM: Thon Reemus SUBJECT: New posting
My latest assignment is completely unacceptable. I have years of training, millions of credits of Czerka implants and six years of experience in the field. After what I've given this company, I deserve better than to be a glorified zoo keeper. Keeping these creatures from eating the environmental monitors is a waste of my talents.

LOG ENTRY 43983 SUBMITTED BY: Foreman Gragov
Refurbished the magnetizers on cargo units seven and eighteen. Crane three is pulling a bit slow, have to order a new motivator. Heard more noises down in waste disposal, but the administrators won't give me clearance to check it out. They'd better not whine to me when the 'freshers stop working.

TO: Alara Galir FROM: Enok Galir SUBJECT: I'm so sorry
My Dearest Alara,
I joined Czerka to try and make the galaxy a better place, but I fear that I may have helped to do the opposite. These monstrosities we've created haunt my dreams every night, and Rasmus wants us to take them further. I will likely never see you and your mother again, but the one hope I have is that you will never learn of what we've done. And if you do, then please forgive me.
-Your loving father

LOG ENTRY 84657 SUBMITTED BY: Doctor Kisadran
The Flesh Raider has been integrated successfully into the network. The results are astounding and the possibilities are extraordinary. Unfortunately the specimen has killed three janitors and two technicians, so finding expendable staff to work on it directly is difficult. Rasmus has suggested Doctor Teak for the task, at least until he is inevitably terminated.
IDENTIFICATION: Drilling Beam
SCANNING DATA: Drill beam emitter contains data on the status of the core. Downloading data now.
IDENTIFICATION: Coded Transmitter
ANALYSIS: System consistent with fleet logistics coordination. Decryption of data requires cyclic code provided via secure antenna arrays.
IDENTIFICATION: Antenna Array
DATA ANALYSIS: Cyclic code segment recorded and acquired. Security signal source partially triangulated.
IDENTIFICATION: Tauntaun Nest

FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Tauntauns keep their fawns in nests in order to protect them from the elements and from roaming predators. Animal trainers use nectar-rich fruits to befriend and study Tauntauns for the purpose of domestication.
IDENTIFICATION: THORN Navigation Beacon
RECONNECTED: Re-established connection between this beacon and THORN's tunnel navigation network.
IDENTIFICATION: Launch Staging Logistics - Coded Transmitter Detected
DATA ANALYSIS: Encrypted data transmission in progress. Closer inspection required for further analysis.
IDENTIFICATION: Narrow-Beam, Burst-Delivery Datastream.
DATA ANALYSIS: A coded set of coordinates delivered via extremely narrow beam to a specific region in three-dimensional space.
IDENTIFICATION: Republic Fighter with Revanite FF codes.
TARGET LOCKED: Firing!
IDENTIFICATION: Encrypted Multiphasic Data Relay

::Shroud Transmitter Identified::
Partial Transmission Decoded: --nonviolent convergence of Imperial/Republic assets observed. Analysis Priority Level: Expedited. MCR-99 report detail to follow--
Revanite Signal Transmitter

Revanite transmission confirmed: Revanite Commander presence highly likely.
Power source detected!
K'lor'Slug Eggs
BIOANALYSIS: Destruction of eggs will cause K'lor'Slugs to emerge and become hostile.
Claw Marks
BIOANALYSIS: DNA Analysis indicates the presence of the grassland species of Tonitran. A highly aggressive and territorial creature.
Lurker Enclave

COMPOSITION ANALYSIS: Provides ample shade. Hollow trunk suggests lurker habitation.
LURKER WARNING: Protective amphibious bipeds. Typically led in packs by largest member.
Cave
DATALOG ANALYSIS: Caves of this type and size are favored by the Rancor species. Approach with extreme caution. Rancors are extremely dangerous and aggressive.
Moisture Rich Environment
SENSOR ANALYSIS: This environment is similar to and favored by creatures native to Dromund Kaas
Krakjya

IDENTIFICATION: KRAKJYA - Powerful back muscles allow krakjyas to leap great distances and pin down quarry several times their own weight long enough to render it lifeless with their long, sharp teeth. Great honor is to be had by any Mandolarian strong enough to bring one down.
Distress Beacon
SIGNAL RECEIVED: Survivor location successfully recorded.
Automated Air Defense Gun
CONNECTION ESTABLISHED: Unique defense turret ID code received.
Data Archive
DATA ACCESSED: Playback of holorecording commencing.
STRUCTURAL ANALYSIS: Ancient Massassi Temple
This temple was built by Massassi servants hundreds of years ago. Archival records accessed. Details recorded to codex for convenient access.

IDENTIFICATION: MCR-X Stealth Recon Probe
::Incoming transmission received:: ::Decoding message::
-- "Nice to have you back. I'll be watching." --
::MCR-X unit re-engaging stealth field::

CONTENT SCAN RESULTS: This datapad contains religious passages referencing Zakuulan Deities pre-dating Emperor Valkorian.
SENSOR ANALYSIS: Residual thermal imprints suggest recent use.
IDENTIFICATION: Portable Data Storage Device
**ANOMALY DETECTED**
Shield Bunker

This Eternal Empire bunker provides remote shielding to the Star Fortress' sun generator power core. Although the facility exhibits minimal external defenses, heat signatures suggest a formidable defense network below ground.

STRUCTURAL FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Molecular vibration frequency suggests pressure sensitive plates.
-Plate function indeterminate.
Pressure Sensitive Plates
Blade Rack
Decorative Stone Podium

STRUCTURAL FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: Electrical field frequency code detected.
-Frequency function: Sensor analysis has determined an object emitting the correct electrical code would unlock the generated dampener field.
Decorative Blade Relic
Stone Relic

STRUCTURAL FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: This decorative sword relic has individual electronic resistors connected by traces that could allow electric currents to flow.
Alternate Function: Locking Mechanism

STRUCTURAL FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: This stone relic has special markings and groove sets that would allow it to connect into the correct receptacle.
Alternate Function: Locking Mechanism
Unknown Structure
Transport Station
Transporter Power Source
Unexplored Biome
Storage Tower

FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: This structure appears similar to others that have been encountered on Iokath. However, previous instances of similar structures have had varied purposes.
RECOMMENDATION: Further investigation needed.

FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: This structure appears to be part of the transportation network for this region of Iokath.
RECOMMENDATION: Control of the transportation system would greatly benefit the Alliance in any efforts in this area. This should be a high priority target.

FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: This structure appears to be housing the power source for the local transporter system.
RECOMMENDATION: There are many unknowns regarding the technology that is being used here. Further investigation is needed by an engeneering corps.

FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: This structure appears to be a biome of some sort.
RECOMMENDATION: Investigate what this biome contains and what its purpose was.

FUNCTIONALITY ASSESSMENT: This appears to be a storage tower. It is uncertain what is being stored at this location.
RECOMMENDATION: Send a team to investigate the contents of the tower and see if there is any tactical significance to it.
Sabacc Cheating Device

This device is sold by the Hutt Cartels for use by high rollers with their luxury sabacc tables. They are connected to the table's card manipulation device and will always allow the house to win in the long run.

This device is unsanctioned and allows the player an unfair advantage over the table's built-in card manipulation device. The user's winnings have been flagged and will not be allowed to leave the casino.
Floor Tile
ANALYSIS: Weakened by microfractures, likely due to the presence of a nearby intermittent heat source.
Steam Pipe
ANALYSIS: Flow is intact. Valve is in functioning order
ANALYSIS: Fractures in the pipe due to exposure to extreme cold.
IDENTIFICATION: Supply Crate
SENSOR ANALYSIS: Metallurgical analysis suggests Republic manufacturing. INTERNAL SCAN: Fertilizer with high levels of nutrients.
IDENTIFICATION: Power Generator
FUNCTIONALITY ANALYSIS: This power generator appears to harness the energy from the many electrical storms that sweep across Ossus to generate power.
IDENTIFICATION: Sensor Antenna
FUNCTIONALITY ANALYSIS: This sensor system provides very long-range weather tracking to help the Jedi anticipate the powerful storms that plague the surface of Ossus.
IDENTIFICATION: Storage Tanks
SENSOR ANALYSIS: Contains a liquid fertilizer with high nutritional content. DATA: Chemical composition downloaded.
IDENTIFICATION: Ossus Crops
SENSOR ANALYSIS: Genetically modified crop strains. Designed specifically to survive harsh storms and able to be planted in barren dirt. DATA: Gene sequences downloaded.
IDENTIFICATION: Ancient Jedi Library

DATALOG ANALYSIS: The largest Jedi Library ever built, it was the center of knowledge and artifacts for the Jedi Order until Ossus was hit by the supernova. It is extremely structurally strong, with the entirety of it built inside a mountain, so much of it has survived the supernova.
IDENTIFICATION: Jedi Master Monument
DATALOG ANALYSIS: This statue dates back to the original settlers of Ossus and depicts a Jedi Master in the standard dress of that era.
IDENTIFICATION: Jedi Padawan Monument
DATALOG ANALYSIS: This statue dates back to the founding of the original settlers of Ossus and depicts a Jedi Padawan in the standard dress of that era.
IDENTIFICATION: Ossus Jedi Temple
DATALOG ANALYSIS: This Jedi temple is one of the oldest recorded, second only to the temple on Tython. The Jedi Order made their home here after first leaving Tython centuries ago.
